price: 27. Balekaka ye na maloba te, basalaka sé na mitindo mia ye.
arabic: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yasbiqūnahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi yaʿmalūna
